title: We're sorry
body:
Dear Rito,

Would you please tell me why is it not possible to transfer gifts between my account ? I didn't even login to the account which the gifts have been sent to. Just to show that I need them on my other account.

We're very clumsy ;-; but please help us.

http://67.media.tumblr.com/9c8b68a088542fc52fe7cb8d000c7373/tumblr_mt14la3Neq1r1vf9eo1_400.gif

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} 

Feelsbadman

replies.body:
This is because according to our [*Refund Policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ), Gifts do not qualify for a refund. 

It certainly sucks when you make a mistake in gifting. :(   Going forward, I suggest being really careful with your purchases and double check something is the right purchase before clicking the buy button.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
